title: Act 3 was cool. (Spoilers)
body:
Act 3 was pretty cool. It had the same issues that Acts 1 and 2 had (Graves being 'spent like an exhausted shotgun shell', for example, is more annoying than cute. I'm not sure if it was a good idea to have MF's entire backstory explained in her section; it pulled me out of the story to have her go 'by the way, this is why I hate Gangplank' at the time, probably not the best idea.) but I liked it just the same.

Does anyone actually think Riot's gonna keep GP dead? Either he managed to survive somehow, or he's going to get resurrected. They're not gonna give him a rework that drastic and then kill him off a week later. Personally, my money's on 'he shows up next harrowing has Spooky Gangplank', what does anyone else think?

replies.body: That bastard is more hard that a tortoise that just ate an hard bastard. He will be fine.
